tds.name: Total Dissolved Solids (TDS)
tds.fairDescription: Moderate TDS level, monitor for potential salinity issues.
tds.poorDescription: High TDS level may lead to soil salinity problems.
tds.unsuitableDescription: Very high TDS level, unsuitable for most irrigation purposes.

ph.name: pH Value
ph.goodDescription: pH is in the ideal range for most crops.
ph.fairDescription: pH is acceptable but may affect some sensitive crops.
ph.poorDescription: pH may affect nutrient availability for many crops.
ph.unsuitableDescription: Extreme pH can severely impact nutrient availability and plant growth.

ecl.name: Toxic Ions (eCl)
ecl.fairDescription: Moderate level of toxic ions, monitor crop response.
ecl.poorDescription: High level of toxic ions can be detrimental to sensitive crops.
ecl.unsuitableDescription: Very high levels of toxic ions (chlorides, sulfates) can be severely harmful to crops.

carbonates.name: Carbonates & Bicarbonates
carbonates.fairDescription: Moderate carbonate level, acceptable for most applications.
carbonates.poorDescription: Elevated carbonate level, may cause some irrigation issues.
carbonates.unsuitableDescription: High level of carbonates and bicarbonates, unfavorable for irrigation.

ionBalance.errorMessageShort: Please check your analysis and re-enter values.
ionBalance.errorDescription: Ion Balance Error: The sum of cations (Na⁺, Ca²⁺, Mg²⁺, K⁺) does not equal the sum of anions (SO₄²⁻, Cl⁻, CO₃²⁻, HCO₃⁻). This indicates an imbalance in measured ions, which may affect the accuracy of other calculations.
ionBalance.goodDescription: Ion balance is within acceptable limits, indicating accurate input data.

ssp.name: Soluble Sodium Percentage (SSP)
ssp.goodDescription: SSP is within safe limits for soil structure.
ssp.fairDescription: Moderate SSP level, monitor soil structure over time.
ssp.poorDescription: High SSP can degrade soil structure.
ssp.unsuitableDescription: Very high SSP poses a significant risk to soil structure.

sar.name: Sodium Adsorption Ratio (SAR)
sar.goodDescription: Low SAR, indicating minimal sodium hazard.
sar.fairDescription: Moderate SAR level, acceptable for most soils.
sar.poorDescription: High SAR may lead to secondary salinization and sodification of soil.
sar.unsuitableDescription: Very high SAR poses a serious risk of sodification and structural damage to soil.

rsc.name: Residual Sodium Carbonate (RSC)
rsc.goodDescription: Negative or low RSC, indicating low alkalization hazard.
rsc.fairDescription: Moderate RSC level, monitor for alkalization issues.
rsc.poorDescription: High RSC indicates an alkalization hazard.
rsc.unsuitableDescription: Very high RSC indicates a severe alkalization hazard and may cause calcium precipitation.

kellyRatio.name: Kelly's Ratio (KR)
kellyRatio.goodDescription: Kelly's Ratio is within safe limits.
kellyRatio.fairDescription: Moderate Kelly's Ratio, acceptable for most conditions.
kellyRatio.poorDescription: High Kelly's Ratio indicates a sodium hazard.
kellyRatio.unsuitableDescription: Very high Kelly's Ratio indicates a severe sodium hazard.

alkalinationHazards.name: Alkalization Hazards
alkalinationHazards.fairDescription: Moderate alkalization hazard, monitor soil pH.
alkalinationHazards.poorDescription: High alkalization hazard may lead to increased soil pH.
alkalinationHazards.unsuitableDescription: Severe alkalization hazard poses a significant risk to soil chemistry.

steblerK.name: Stebler's Ratio (K)
steblerK.goodDescription: Stebler's Ratio is in the optimal range.
steblerK.fairDescription: Moderate Stebler's Ratio values, acceptable quality.
steblerK.poorDescription: Stebler's Ratio indicates potential water quality problems.
steblerK.unsuitableDescription: Stebler's Ratio value indicates water unsuitability for irrigation.

cie.name: Cation Exchange Index (CIE)
cie.fairDescription: Moderate CIE, acceptable for most crops.
cie.poorDescription: Abnormal CIE can affect plant growth, development, and soil.
cie.unsuitableDescription: CIE indicates water unsuitability for irrigation.

magnesiumRatio.name: Magnesium Ratio
magnesiumRatio.fairDescription: Moderate magnesium ratio, acceptable for most crops.
magnesiumRatio.poorDescription: High magnesium ratio can negatively impact soil structure.
magnesiumRatio.unsuitableDescription: Very high magnesium ratio poses a significant risk to soil structure and plant nutrition.

permeabilityIndex.name: Permeability Index
permeabilityIndex.fairDescription: Moderate permeability, acceptable for most conditions.
permeabilityIndex.poorDescription: Low permeability indicates water infiltration problems.
permeabilityIndex.unsuitableDescription: Very poor permeability expected, severe infiltration issues likely.

corrosionRatio.name: Corrosion Ratio
corrosionRatio.goodDescription: Low corrosion potential for irrigation systems.
corrosionRatio.fairDescription: Moderate corrosion potential, monitor equipment condition.
corrosionRatio.poorDescription: High corrosion potential for irrigation systems.
corrosionRatio.unsuitableDescription: Very high corrosion potential poses a serious risk to irrigation infrastructure.

agc.name: Aydarov-Golovatov Coefficient (AGC)
agc.goodDescription: Aydarov-Golovatov Coefficient is within acceptable limits.
agc.fairDescription: Moderate Aydarov-Golovatov Coefficient values, acceptable for irrigation.
agc.poorDescription: Aydarov-Golovatov Coefficient indicates potential suitability problems for irrigation.
agc.unsuitableDescription: Aydarov-Golovatov Coefficient values indicate water unsuitability for irrigation purposes.

thermodynamic.name: Thermodynamic Indicators
thermodynamic.fairDescription: Acceptable water for irrigation of most crops.
